page.title: 03 Home Life.
page.content: My name is Rachel Cope,I am ten years old and live at home with my parents, elder brother Kevin and sister Sarah. I get up at about 7.00am, get dressed and have my breakfast. Then I pack my bag and go to school but first I take my big brother to college. When I get to Faber School I play with my friends and normally have a good day. When I get home I change into my old clothes. After tea I watch T.V for about an hour.Then I do my homework ,go for a walk or play with my friend Claire. Sometimes I play on my own.I come in to the house about 8.00pm to watch more T.V until 8.30.Then I wash and undress for bed but sometimes come down stairs till 9.00pm.When I get to bed I occasionally read before going to sleep at about 9.15pm.I sleep very well normally except when the cat scratches at the window to come in.
